Cheat.Text: Resources never decrease (build general storage to request more)
infinite travel distance on the map
MAX money on get or use
MAX science Points on get or use
happy population ( effect production rate positively)
infinite stored tower water (use with caution)
infinite battery storage capacity(build or destroy a battery)(need save reloading to be disabled)
infinite water storage capacity(build or destroy a water storage)(need save reloading to be disabled)
infinite water tower storage capacity(build or destroy a tower)(need save reloading to be disabled)(use with caution)
infinite energy production (need save reloading to be disabled)
infinite water production (build or destroy a water source)(need save reloading to be disabled)
